title: unable to load dynamic library pdo_mysql.so
body:
### expected behaviour
error message should disappear and owncloud should not hang on sometimes

### actual behaviour
1.the folowwing error message appear at owncloud.log:
"php startup: unable to load dynamic library '/usr/lib/php5/20090626+lfs/pdo_mysql.so' - /usr/lib/php5/20090626+lfs/pdo_mysql.so: undefined symbol: pdo_parse_params at unknown#0"
2.if i wanna reset an account password (-> send mail) owncloud hang on for some minutes

### steps to reproduce
?

### server configuration
operating system: ubuntu linaro

web server: nginx 1.1.19

database: sql 5.5.31

php version: 5.3.10

owncloud version: 5.0.6

### client configuration
browser: firefox, chromium

operating system: linaro, windows 7
